mapper.select:
select count(1) from advice where 1=1
and title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
and author like concat('%',#{author},'%')
and keywords like concat('%',#{keywords},'%')
and istop = #{istop}
mapper.insert: insert into advice(title, author, editor, image, brief, original, looktime, content, keywords, publishtime, shelftime, istop, createtime, creater, `type`, url) values (#{title}, #{author}, #{editor}, #{image}, #{brief}, #{original}, #{lookTime}, #{content}, #{keywords}, #{publishtime}, #{shelftime}, #{istop}, now(), #{creater}, #{type}, #{url});
mapper.select: select id, title, author, editor, image, content, original, looktime, keywords, sort, brief, date_format(publishtime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as publishtime, date_format(shelftime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as shelftime, istop, date_format(createtime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createtime, `type`, url from advice where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update news set title = #{title}, author = #{author}, editor = #{editor}, brief = #{brief}, original = #{original}, looktime = #{lookTime}, image = #{image}, content = #{content}, keywords = #{keywords}, publishtime = #{publishtime}, shelftime = #{shelftime}, istop = #{istop}, updatetime = now(), updater = ${updater}, `type` = #{type}, url = #{url} where id = #{id}
